column4: o.O all of my applications are missing from the unity Dash...
and when i hit alt-f2, it cant find any executables
i swear i didnt do anything to cause this
little help?
If you open a terminal and type an application name does it start?
yes.
just unity is confused for some reason.
What happens if you run: unity --reset-icons in terminal
what does --reset-icons do before I do it?
sounds dangerous.
reset the Unity Launcher icons to default
its not a launcher iddue.
You might need to rearrange them a bit
issue*
its a daashboard issue.
the launcher icons are perfect.
aah
Could you check if unity-place-applications and unity-place-files are installed?
Qalgi, language, and also the channel is always very full.
!patience | Qalqi
fwiw, rm ~/.local/share/zeitgeist/activity.sqlite fixed my issue.  zeitgeist was out to lunch.  Just ran that and "unity --replace" and it's golden.
ok, good to know
